item.description:
So, this may be the only time you'll see me post something non-improv related to this announcement list. This also may be the only time you'll ever see me rapping on stage in Boston.

My favorite nerdcore rapper, MC Frontalot, is coming to town to perform. He's never met me, but I wrote him a rap that doubled as a request-to-rap-on-stage-with-him. 24 hours later, he told me I will be performing with him on monday night


I won't be improvising (unless I forget my rhymes) but I could definitely use all of your support! And anyone who wants to go but can't afford the ticket ($10 advance, $12 at the door) -- let me know and I will split the ticket with you or pay all of the ticket depending on how thick my wallet is by the end of the night!

My music will sound like this :
http://www.humannatur...

MC Frontalot's music will sound like this :
http://www.youtube.co...


-B
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the guy on stage with a microphone.
item.name: Ben Camp raps. Like rhymes. With a microphone.
